vsParam:
Here's the thing! I want you to go with me to kill a monster.
Can you do that?

I am sorry, but you alone are more than sufficient
to deal with such a low-level monster...

Yeah.
Did you get the target wrong?

Er, yes. The purpose of this commission
is to closely observe your progress!
Um... W, why would you have such an idea all of a sudden?

Not long ago, the teachers and captains of the guard had a
meeting. We discussed about our students' progress.

I started to feel uneasy after listening to them!
I must confirm your progress with my own eyes!

So, I am sorry? Please!
Just take my commission, okay?
I can't turn something like this down...
How can you turn her down looking at her expecting eyes...

Might as well. And sensei quite looks forward to
seeing our performance...

Got it, Majorum Sensei.
We'll take this commission!

Ho ho, thank you!
I shall wait for your splendid performance!

That's the monster!
Looks like it has gotten ready for a fight.

Do you best! Ah, but you must be
careful, and don't get hurt!

Well done. You just brought a wonderful performance.
I saw the progress and development you've made.

As an alchemist, [px]
demonstrated a great flexibility in the use of items.

The items synthesized are of better quality.
The improvements can be seen with my eyes!

Uh, great.
You are energetic, too, wonderful!

It's great for you to remain humble!
Uh~ Here, a little red flower for you!

Anis made the best of relicology
knowledge she learnt.

Since you have a very strong foundation, you can do things
with facility. Please keep it up!

For Cresson, not only have you improved your swordsmanship,
you also got more mature mentally.

You perfectly demonstrated what it takes to be a guard when
you protected everyone... Just like what Tandrion said!

T, thanks!
*Sob sob*... I didn't realize that Captain is so approve of me!

Sensei, you'll spoil everyone if you
give compliments all the time.

Ho ho, I am not spoiling you guys.
I am just telling the truth.

Your support and backup were all in the right places, Sorel.
I saw your efforts and growth.

For a witch, a broad vision is essential,
please keep it that way and keep working!

S, shut it!
It's just... getting a bit hot here!

Ho ho... Majorum Sensei not only cares about wizardology
students, she also cares about students of other disciplines
and guards.
Yeah. I hope you all to scale new heights!
